programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep12
programme.desc: Seasons - Wild Wild East travels through time and space to show what one-year — and four seasons — looks like for the wildest animals of Canada’s East-Coast.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep13
programme.desc: Deer - In Hampton, New Brunswick the deer population is running wild. In the summer locals struggle to maintain their crops from growing fawns and hungry does. Sightings have reached an all time high and residents fear the overpopulation may be at its tipping point.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dung Beetles: Nature's Recycler - There are more species of beetle in the world than any other animal, and few play a role as important as the humble dung beetle. These tiny counterparts to Africa’s giant plant eaters bring balance to a system that supports life like no other.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Meet the Meerkats - Meerkats may be small and vulnerable, but they’re tenacious characters. Together, they’re a force to be reckoned with. For this growing family, teamwork isn’t just keeping them alive; it’s helping them thrive.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Predator's Plight - There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lethal By Design - Snakes, spiders and scorpions: these creepy crawlies are the animals we connect with least and fear most. While it’s true they have some of the most venomous creatures in the world within their ranks, what is less commonly accepted is that they are often more scared of us then we are of them.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Lost World of the Yucatan - The rainforest meets the Caribbean in this breathtaking region of eastern Mexico. Journey into impenetrable jungle, dive deep into mysterious underwater caves and wade through lush everglades that shelter Mexico’s largest predator: Morelet’s crocodile.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Heart of Sierra Gorda - In the heart of central Mexico lies Sierra Gorda, one region made up of many worlds. Climb skyward from 300 to 3,000 metres above sea level, beginning in the low hills of an ancient semi-desert up into a dense green cloud forest that abounds with bobcats, pumas and flying squirrels.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Costa Rica: Sky to Sea - Costa Rica is a world of its own - a tropical corridor squeezed between two great oceans, powered by raging rivers and simmering volcanoes. As its volcanoes erupt, they deposit minerals into the soil, making the land fertile and creating the country’s rich biodiversity.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Journey Begins - The source of the Mekong River is high up in the Tibetan plateau, from there it flows into Yunnan Province, China, where our journey begins. Even though Yunnan occupies less than 4% of China’s land, it is home to over half of its birds and mammals.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creature Comforts - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep6
programme.desc: To the Rescue - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including “ranch manager” Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep12
programme.desc: Seasons - Wild Wild East travels through time and space to show what one-year — and four seasons — looks like for the wildest animals of Canada’s East-Coast.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Predator's Plight - There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lethal By Design - Snakes, spiders and scorpions: these creepy crawlies are the animals we connect with least and fear most. While it’s true they have some of the most venomous creatures in the world within their ranks, what is less commonly accepted is that they are often more scared of us then we are of them.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Lost World of the Yucatan - The rainforest meets the Caribbean in this breathtaking region of eastern Mexico. Journey into impenetrable jungle, dive deep into mysterious underwater caves and wade through lush everglades that shelter Mexico’s largest predator: Morelet’s crocodile.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Heart of Sierra Gorda - In the heart of central Mexico lies Sierra Gorda, one region made up of many worlds. Climb skyward from 300 to 3,000 metres above sea level, beginning in the low hills of an ancient semi-desert up into a dense green cloud forest that abounds with bobcats, pumas and flying squirrels.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Costa Rica: Sky to Sea - Costa Rica is a world of its own - a tropical corridor squeezed between two great oceans, powered by raging rivers and simmering volcanoes. As its volcanoes erupt, they deposit minerals into the soil, making the land fertile and creating the country’s rich biodiversity.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep46
programme.desc: 8-Bit Of Trouble / The Founding Feathers - When Archibald accidentally gets digitized by Loy’s laser scanner, he finds himself trapped inside a computer game. / Archibald discovers a long lost play that chronicles the founding of Crackridge. But when he over-promises a same day production, he must scramble to put on the historic show.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep15
programme.desc: It Crushes / Rebel Without A Paws - Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep13
programme.desc: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom - Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep13
programme.desc: Pretty In Pinkeye / The Monsters Are Due On Harvey Street - Pinkeye gets a makeover and takes his new persona a little bit too far. The kids rally when Harvey E. Harveson statue’s hand is replaced with a mysterious note.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost And Found / In The Park In The Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep46
programme.desc: 8-Bit Of Trouble / The Founding Feathers - When Archibald accidentally gets digitized by Loy’s laser scanner, he finds himself trapped inside a computer game. / Archibald discovers a long lost play that chronicles the founding of Crackridge. But when he over-promises a same day production, he must scramble to put on the historic show.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep37
programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower For Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with “glamping” gear, the kids decide they prefer Guy’s plush method of camping to Branch’s insistence on roughing it./Poppy’s the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep39

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep26
programme.desc: Tur-Bros / The Snailman - During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep25
programme.desc: Why Flamingo Stands On One Leg - You see there was a time when Flamingo stood on both legs. One morning, Flamingo and her flock landed at the Water Hole when all the crabs were busy performing their underwater dance. Needless to say, all these legs where in their way! Tortoise came up with the plan that if all Crabs each nipped a flamingo leg, there will be room to share the waterhole. So from then on, Flamingo stood on one legs and Crabs were able to perform their dance in the watering hole

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep26
programme.desc: Why Woodpecker Pecks - You see there was a time when Woodpecker didn't peck. All the birds had their very own sound, but Woodpecker didn't make a sound at all. Then one very dark night in Tinga Tinga, the Moon and the Stars disappear! The animals summon the birds to tell Lion… but Woodpecker can't pass the message on! Distraught, Woodpecker flies up to the skies… but where are the stars?! And where is the Moon?! In desperation Woodpecker pecks at the dark sky… and a star comes back, then another, then another! Everyone is delighted, no beast more than Woodpecker who now has her very own special sound… pecking.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep77
programme.desc: Fifi'S Busy Day - Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep78
programme.desc: Dingaling Poppy - Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep25
programme.desc: What'S The Grumbly Rumbly Noise? - Jess sets out to re-assure his frightened friends by working out what the noise is in the sky that's so loud.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep26
programme.desc: When Will The Snow Come? - Jess is hoping that soon it will snow so that they can make snow kittens and play in the snow like they did last year. First though he has to work out what the weather would have to be like for the snow to come..

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep52
programme.desc: Switcher-Ruby/Bye Bye Bunker - Poppy and Branch switch bodies, and learn to appreciate each other’s point of view. /When Branch decides it’s time for him to move out of the bunker, Poppy tries to be as supportive as she can, even though it seems Branch himself may have some doubts.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep45
programme.desc: See You Next Pluesday / The Doppelganger - After learning Murph is moving away, Archibald wishes for one last day to spend with her. But when the wish magically comes true, Archibald is forced to relive the same day over and over again. / Archibald meets his doppelganger and enjoys all the fun that comes with having a twin. But when the doppelganger threatens to become a permanent fixture in the Strutter house, Archibald must prove he is the real deal.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The world’s worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Tenuous Takedown Of The Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.desc: Queen Of Police / Roidian Prom - When Tip takes over Kyle's job as "King of Police," she removes all rules from Boovsland and it descends into chaos; Tip and Oh accompany DieAnne to Roidian Prom

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep27
programme.desc: The Wrath Of Hughes - When Peabody and Sherman kill comedy in Ancient Greece, they team up with their alter egos to defeat a cyborg version of Mrs. Hughes and fix history

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep27
programme.desc: Lucky And La Voltereta Feroz - While Lucky and Spirit struggle to find their place In the circus, Pru and Abigail set out across the frontier to track down their runaway friend

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep14
programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep1
programme.desc: Why Elephant Has A Trunk - You see there was a time when Elephant had no nose. He couldn't swat away the flies, or scrub his belly… he couldn't even blow his nose. Then one day snappy Crocodile snapped! Crocodile pulled and he pulled and he pulled… until Ker-doing!!! Crocodile let go and Elephant's nose was all long and wiggly! And that's why Elephant has a trunk. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep2
programme.desc: Why Snake Has No Legs - You see there was a time when Snake did have legs… hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga. But when Snake came back to return Millipede's eyes, Millepede couldn't be found anywhere! So to this day, Snake has no legs. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep53
programme.desc: Compost Chaos - Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble'S Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep1
programme.desc: How Do We Make A Boat? - Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light… having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep2
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Warm? - It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep40
programme.desc: The Fast And The Friendliest / Much Achoo About Nothing - Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protégé./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep26
programme.desc: Shadows Of Bali - Odlulu uses the Shadow Puppet Key to create her own living shadows. When her mischievous shadows run off with the key, the Wanderers learn the only way to reattach the shadows is to touch them with the key. So, with the promise of a puppet show, they lure the shadows to the puppet theater, where they launch an epic game of tag to recapture the shadows before sunset

programme.desc: My Cousin Chloé - Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Pancakes - Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Trip to the Moon - Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Spider - Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep214
programme.desc: What I Like About Blue - It's LOVE DAY! Josh and Blue LOVE Love Day, and Blue is making YOU something very special. While we play Blue's Clues to figure out what she's making, we help Slippery finish his Love Day Cards and help cheer up our sad Heart Friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos - Sir Steel gets Professor Scratch to create an anti-gravity ray, which goes wrong in the hands of Ricardo! // Muffin's super bouncy ball threatens to wreck the annual Winter Festival! Kai learns to sacrifice something he loves for the greater good!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Lola's Air Display / Down The Sewers - Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? // The kids are playing in the garden & make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Pups Save a Melon Festival / Pups Save A Cow - Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Cart-tastrophe - Bossy schemes to get Turtle new Boom Boom Super Satang cards.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Center of a Tension - Bossy and Turtle have their first sleepover ever.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Honey Bear - When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Shrunken Ships / The Pirate Parade - When Escarlata turns the crew tiny, they have to find a pint-sized way to save the day. // It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Compass Caper - Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Daddy Loses his Glasses - Daddy Pig is a little upset because he lost his glasses, so Peppa and George try to find them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it’s home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Snow Rescue Blaze - When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep618
programme.desc: The Fastest of them All - When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Save a Waiter-Bot / Pups Stop a Pie-Clone - Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the café, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town! // Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! The Pups must stop it before the town is covered.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep711
programme.desc: Pups Save the Skydivers / Pups Save the Cupcakes - Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. It's Paw Patrol to the rescue! // Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder, the Paw Patrol dives in to save the day!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Monday Funday - The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis - It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Paddington and The House Guest / Paddington and The Banana - Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized. // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep616
programme.desc: The Big Rig Bandit! - When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! But when the big rig chase lands Spotty and Eli in danger, it's up to the Guppies to save the day!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Blue's Show and Tell Surprise - Sharpen your pencils, because Josh and Blue are going to SCHOOL! While Blue and her friends go through their school day, we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to share at Show and Tell.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Blue's Anywhere Box Surprise - Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Whale of a Tale / The Pirate Painter - When whales start to pile up in Caracole Cove, Santi and crew must stop the noisy undersea disruption to their usual migration pattern. // When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Cart-tastrophe - Bossy schemes to get Turtle new Boom Boom Super Satang cards.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Science Pair - Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Center of a Tension - Bossy and Turtle have their first sleepover ever.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep703
programme.desc: Pups Save an Antarctic Martian - Travelling Travis is on another great adventure when he lands in Antarctica but believes he's actually on Mars.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep714
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater / Pups Save Ryder's Surprise - A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep139
programme.desc: The Museum - Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Very Hot Day - It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Froga's Hat - Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Anna's Horse - Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Big News with Blue - Blue has something exciting to tell everybody! In this game of Blue's Clues, Josh and the viewer go on a note finding quest, solving riddles, and following treasure maps to find out the answer to Blue's Big News.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Blue's Big Costume Parade - Everyone's dressed up in silly costumes for our BIG costume parade, but we don't know what costume Blue wants to wear! As we play Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Shovel make a truck-tastic costume and skidoo into Jill's puppet theater play!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Small Is Smashing / Pine Cone Power Up - Sir Steel wants to shrink the trees in the Central Forest to make way for his new tower. Deer Squad have to think small to stop him! // Lola and her souped-up Rocket Rabbit wake the residents of the Central Forest with all the engine's roars.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Steel Antlers / Berry Bad - Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep227
programme.desc: Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2 - The Browns take Paddington to London as a special treat for his birthday but they lose him on the way! // Paddington ends up in the Tower of London & has a close encounter with the Crown Jewels, a Beefeater and a Royal couple!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey / Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour / Honey Bear / The Science Pair - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park. // When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend. // Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Silver Lasso / The Sea Dragon's Treasure - Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure. // After Enrique nabs a Sea Dragon's golden egg, it's up to the good pirates to nab it back before things get out of control.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue - After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Hiccups - George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Playground - Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Puts Up a Picture - Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep146
programme.desc: At the Beach - Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep147
programme.desc: Mister Skinnylegs - George finds a spider in the bathroom sink, but Peppa is really frightened-until she realizes that it doesn't want to hurt her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Campfire Stories - It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Lifeguard Blaze! - Today, Blaze and AJ are on a mission to become Lifeguards. But it'll take four daring rescues to achieve their official Lifeguard badge and only the bravest monster trucks have what it takes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck / Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise. // Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Baby Super Shark - Vigo's evil plot to turn everyfishy in Carnivore Cove into babies backfires when toddlers Super Shark and Captain Kelp turn out to be a finful.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Paddington's Pet Hotel / Paddington Plays Golf - Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. // Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says and how should you hold a club Paddington?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost - Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep148
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Boat - Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep150
programme.desc: My Birthday Party - It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep151
programme.desc: Daddy's Movie Camera - Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Trouble in Harmony Valley! - Everyone in the Old West town of Harmony Valley loves playing music together. But when noisy Billy Joe Strumlouder rides into town to sabotage their tunes, Sheriff Zooli must save the day--with music!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Blue's Big Imagination - Imagine along with Josh and Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue envisions a mysterious shape to be. We listen to a story created by Slippery, Magenta and Tickety and help Mr. Salt discover his own imagination!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Sleepy Singalong with Blue - It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Chickcharney Island / The Lost Girl in a Canoe - With the help of their new friends, the Chickcharneys, Santi and crew must stop Pepito from stealing their treasured drum. // The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon / Happy Bestie-versary / The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy. // Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary. // Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep703
programme.desc: Pups Save the Maze Explorers - Mr. Porter and Alex go on a sightseeing hike but get trapped inside a huge maze! The Paw Patrol has to find the maze and their friends!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep141
programme.desc: Chloe's Puppet Show - Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep142
programme.desc: Daddy Gets Fit - Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep143
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep75
programme.desc: Greens - Tinky Winky, Laa-Laa and Po pick delicious green beans. The Noo-­‐noo puts the beans into the Tubby Custard Machine and out comes tasty, green Tubby Custard!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Bed - Dee encourages a friend to say bed and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep59
programme.desc: Tunnel Vision - When an erupting geyser disturbs the rabbits, the team helps them to find a more peaceful home.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep6
programme.desc: It's time to bake - Gran Gran and JoJo are excited to bake a batch of Great Gran Gran's signature Saint Lucian banana bread, but there's a problem - they don't know how long to bake it for!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Cubby House - Monty is disappointed to find the cubby house Stan built him is empty inside, until he begins to fill it with his imagination.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Daredevil Dude - Monty ponders whether all heroes have to solve big problems or if there are some superheroes who focus on smaller tasks.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Shadowlands - On a picnic in the park, Bluey and her friends play Shadowlands. Coco keeps taking shortcuts so Bluey has to show her that following the rules can make the game more fun.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep26
programme.desc: The Puddle Badge - Happy sets his sights on a very questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in, much to the horror of Duggee and the other Squirrels - and the tiny citizens of Midgetropolis who live inside it!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep25
programme.desc: The Biology Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels hop inside the Biology Bus and miniaturize themselves to go on a voyage of discovery inside Enid, to find out what's making her cough.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep24
programme.desc: The Taste Badge - Duggee is making a smoothie. The Squirrels can't agree on whether it's delicious or horrible, so they make their own adventurous smoothies showcasing their favourite flavours to discover what taste is.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Ilulissat, Greenland - Grandmaster Glitch has travelled to Ilulissat in Greenland to show his teddy, Cuddles, the sights. But Cuddles ends up getting stuck in the snow!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Horsetail Fall, California - The Go Jetters have travelled to Horsetail Fall in the Yosemite National Park to watch the 300m high waterfall become Firefall.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Daddy Robot - Bluey and Bingo don't want to tidy the playroom, so they get Daddy Robot to do it. But when Bluey takes things too far, Daddy Robot malfunctions!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Keepy Uppy - Bluey, Bingo and Mum are enjoying playing Keepy-Uppy around the house, when Dad joins in and the game becomes the ultimate test of skill.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Andy and the Weedy Sea Dragon - When Andy finds a newly hatched weedy sea dragon, will he manage to snap the perfect photo of it and make it back before the opening of the exhibition?

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Caterpillars - Benjamin and his brothers want to find out about teeny tiny creatures that crawl - caterpillars. Chantelle meets Ezzie at The Magic of Life Butterfly House in Aberystwyth.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Salute - Joseph, Ella, George and Faye try to win back Gem's jewels. Meanwhile, Captain Sinker teaches Cook and Line her own Sinker salute, but they struggle with the actions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep23
programme.desc: The Mix Tape Badge - The Squirrels are exploring in the attic when they find an old cassette tape, and decide to make a mixtape for Duggee to remind him of all the happy memories they've made while earning their badges.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep22
programme.desc: The Election Badge - It's time for the summer fair. Eugene is the organiser, but it's so much work that he quits - he can't take the pressure. So it's up to the Squirrels and their friends to find a new leader.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep21
programme.desc: The Mystery Badge - The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Global Gameshow - It's the Go Jetters as you've never seen them before as they take part in a disco dazzling around the world gameshow!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Chocolate Hills, Philippines - Greedy Grandmaster Glitch has been gorging on chocolate and wants more! The Grimbots discover a place called the Chocolate Hills on Bohol Island in the Philippines and take him there.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep12
programme.desc: Being Percy - Percy decides to imitate wise old Gordon in order to win the respect of the other engines.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep10

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep9

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Ship Ahoy - It's so misty in the Camping Park that Nelly and Nora almost need a boat.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Dog Loves Pyramids - Dog and Pug find Granny Pug by a pyramid. Unfortunately, they disturb two ancient Egyptian gods in the form of a cat and a dog.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Night's Alright - Even though it is bedtime, Monty and Jimmy Jones aren't tired and Monty wonders if the night is really just for sleeping.

programme.desc: The Thing That Knew Everything - Gwen meets a group of Dinos who are waiting for The One Who Knows Everything.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Floral Garlands & Tropical Fruit Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Costa Georgiadis makes garlands: Jane Edmanson gives beginner tips; Sophie Thomson learns about bushfood; Jerry Coleby-Williams identifies bugs; Millie Ross finds a rare plant; guest Palisa Anderson tastes tropical fruits.

programme.title: Hannah Gadsby's OZ Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Hannah is still searching for a more inclusive Australian identity in our art. In this episode she enters the NOW! But in post-Cronulla Australian art this Identity seems even harder to define. (Final)

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Sigrid Thornton Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Anh is joined by Australian screen legend Sigrid Thornton for an intimate chat about the people and moments that have shaped her life, worldview and career. Will Anh be able to capture her range and her warmth? (Final)

programme.title: Throwback Ep2
programme.desc: Meet the creators, authors and entertainers who shaped our childhood. Featuring Pamela Clark (Children's Birthday Cake Book), Peter Combe, Melissa Kang (Dolly Doctor), Andy Griffiths, Terry Denton & Luke Carroll (Lift Off).

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Luke leaves the hustle and bustle of Hanoi behind for the mystical mountains of Sapa. There, he prepares some black chicken in and amongst the local streets.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep110
programme.desc: Matthew Doran brings you all the very latest news and interviews on what's going on in the halls of Parliament House in Canberra and the topics and events making headlines from coast to coast in politics and national affairs.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep130
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, the best coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to get you up to speed on what you need to know.

programme.title: The Drum Ep115
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC News Ep181
programme.desc: News from where you live. ABC News Victoria brings you the day's top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Tamara Oudyn (Sun-Thu) and Mary Gearin (Fri-Sat).

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 16 - Sydney Swans v Geelong Cats Ep90
programme.desc: Round 16 of the AFL Premiership Season sees Sydney host Geelong. Can the Swans keep their hopes of playing in the finals alive or will the reigning premiers the Cats make another step towards defending their title?

programme.title: The World Ep130
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: China Tonight Ep10
programme.desc: After the Trade Minister's trip to Beijing, Australia/China relations are on the improve. PM Albanese says he intends to travel to China but will we see a further easing of trade sanctions? Hosted by Sam Yang and Annie Louey.

programme.title: Escape From The City - Port Douglas QLD: The Grays Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - With a sizeable budget in play, Phil and Lara are hoping to find not only their next family home, but an investment property too. Finance expert Del Irani is on hand to dish out plenty of helpful advice during the search.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Forces of Nature - Cyclone Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Cyclones burst upon Australia's tropical coast bringing torrential rain and destruction, while ancient rain forests and coral reefs are destroyed. Aaron Pedersen explains how these ecosystems have evolved and adapted.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep130
programme.desc: Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Michael Tetlow brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep22
programme.desc: All eyes are on the Reserve Bank ahead of their July decision on interest rates. Will we see inflation begin to moderate and real wages start to move upward? Cost of living pressures build after 12 rate rises since May 2022.

programme.title: The World Ep130
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep24
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor brings you a snapshot of the week's international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Asia.

programme.title: China Tonight Ep10
programme.desc: After the Trade Minister's trip to Beijing, Australia/China relations are on the improve. PM Albanese says he intends to travel to China but will we see a further easing of trade sanctions? Hosted by Sam Yang and Annie Louey.

programme.title: One Plus One - The Elders - Ian Hamm Ep4
programme.desc: From Yarrawonga in Victoria's Yorta Yorta Country, Ian Hamm shares with Dan how his own story of being a 'stolen child' sparked his life-long determination to reshape how Government policies affect First Nations people.

programme.title: The Drum Ep115
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Floral Garlands & Tropical Fruit Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Costa Georgiadis makes garlands: Jane Edmanson gives beginner tips; Sophie Thomson learns about bushfood; Jerry Coleby-Williams identifies bugs; Millie Ross finds a rare plant; guest Palisa Anderson tastes tropical fruits.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep24
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep21
programme.desc: Join Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast: Early Ep26
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Fauziah Ibrahim and Kathryn Robinson bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote and finance with David Chau.

programme.title: ABC News Ep52

programme.desc: Music is the first language of teenage drum prodigy Soma Yoyoka. When video of her playing a Led Zeppelin song went viral, Yoyoka and her family moved to the US to pursue her dreams of making music.

programme.title: J-Arena
programme.desc: The sport of competitive karuta is based on a traditional Japanese card game. It requires good cognitive skills and fast reflexes. We take a close look at the sport and its overseas popularity.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth

programme.title: Bento Expo
programme.desc: Maki and Marc prepare bentos with Shichimi Togarashi, a blend of seven spices that is used all throughout Japan. From Tokyo, a hanami bento perfect for viewing cherry blossoms.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Papermaker Igarashi Masami's "Food Paper," based on historic Echizen washi, incorporates vegetable discards and scraps. Her aim is to raise awareness of food loss while promoting traditional crafts.

programme.desc: This program gives you comprehensive coverage of events in Japan and Asia. It explains the day's developments and what is behind them.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Air pollution causes millions of premature deaths. Anirudh Sharma, from India, has developed a method of making ink from car emissions. What drives this self-described "chronic inventor"?

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Off To Go Bathing
programme.desc: A mother and daughter brave the rain to visit their local bathhouse, exchanging words with a young girl along the way. We learn that regular bathing was an essential part of life for the townspeople.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: In Japan, research is advancing on heavy ion radiotherapy, a promising alternative to conventional radiotherapy. It could be more powerful and effective on difficult-to-treat cancers.

programme.title: At One With Nature
programme.desc: National Parks of Japan: We explore the Towada-Hachimantai National Park, visiting the Towada-Hakkoda area with its tranquil lake and pure stream, and the Hachimantai area, a famous volcanic region.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
programme.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
programme.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture. Adults play the role of the shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: The Hisatsu Orange Railway connects Kumamoto and Kagoshima, where waves crest bountiful fishing grounds and a variety of citrus trees dot the area. Meet the residents who eek a living from these seas.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at plastic food samples: accurate replicas of real dishes.

programme.title: Samurai Castles: Hikone Castle
programme.desc: Hikone Castle, a National Treasure, employs ingenious devices to deter attack yet it boasts a decorative facade. History buff Chris Glenn delves into how and why the castle uses recycled buildings.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Hanami, Kyoto's cherry viewing festivities in the spring. Dive deep into the beauty of the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC278UsmanvsEdwards2

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep905AdesanyavsVettori2
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC at 185 pounds, reigning middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his title in a rematch against the “The Italian Dream” Marvin Vettori at UFC 263. See both men train and prepare to fight for UFC middleweight gold.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC279DiazvsFerguson

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep8
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep7
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs Topuria
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs Topuria is set to take place in June 2023, featuring a highly anticipated matchup between featherweight contenders Josh Emmett and Ilia Topuria. Both fighters bring an impressive record of wins and knockouts, promising an explosive battle in the octagon. The event will also showcase a stacked card of undercard and preliminary fights, featuring some of the best up-and-coming talent in the sport. UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs Topuria is a must-watch event for fans of mixed martial arts, promising an unforgettable night of high-octane action and fierce competition.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vettori vs. Cannonier
programme.desc: Prelims - Top five contenders intent on keeping their hopes for a middleweight championship alive, Marvin Vettori and Jared Cannonier square off in the main event of UFC on ESPN on June 18 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a win over rising star Roman Dolidze, Italy’s Vettori is determined to not let anyone pass him on the road to top, but he will have to survive the thunder thrown at him by Cannonier, who owns knockout victories over Anderson Silva, Jack Hermansson and Derek Brunson

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Prelims - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now he’ll look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
